author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
New workflows follow the ECal Phase-2 TP development in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42633
The PR seems to pick all commits from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42633 where the only commit on this PR is on  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43056/commits/5f196455b5594732125a180d4d21e5d163a5e65a

#### PR validation:
Run 24834.633, 24834.634

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
No need of backport
title: (DRAFT) Add ECAL Phase-2 TP workflows, also with ECAL component
